title: Figure, "Caricature of Prokofiev", ca. 1935
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Bust-length figure of man with blond hair, wearing blue bow tie, dark jacket, his hands rest on small square base

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Caricature of Prokofiev", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-204.
